name: The Only One You Need
description:
The Only One You Need is a first-person 3D game that has the elements of light-hearted romance, platforming and decision-making. It is a short game and can be completed within 10 minutes. The game is made using Unity and please forgive me for the bugs since I'm a beginner.  The game uses a black-and-white filter with some jazz music to achieve a 1940s era.  The game has few levels for now, but more levels will be added later. Please do comment if you have any suggestions for further levels and refinement for the game.

                                        "Maybe you're the only one I need"                                          

Hints:

-> Please follow ! to reach the destination, especially at the tower level.

-> To pick flowers, go to areas with ! A cutscene will be played, click E to confirm the flower. Also don't trigger other flower cutscenes, looking at them might cause your girl to leave ya. 

-> The game has no menu or save. Will be added later once more levels are there. The game ends when you see the title again!

-> There are skip buttons to skip the story. But it will be nice if y'all know the story:(

Music Used:

Count Every Star - Al Hibbler

Stars Fell on Alabama - She and Him

(And some jazz music too)

Please note that the soundtracks and assets used in the game belong to their respective owners. Hope you enjoy the game and please feel free to comment with your suggestions.
